description: Sweat-drenched, dirty and totally turned on after a big game, ballers Cal Jackson, Maxx Diesel, Rob Romoni, Andy Hunter and Jason Hawke stroke their huge cocks as they peel off their sweaty jocks. As the circle jerk quickly becomes an orgy, Tyler Gunn joins in on the fun. As things get really hot and heavy, the team's quarterback, Josh Weston, joins in. They all shoot their thick loads on Josh's helmet.
title: Quarterback Sack
